text: Aey woh logo jo eman laye ho! Meray aur (khud) apney dushmanon ko apna dost na banao tum to dosti say unn ki taraf payghaam bhejtay ho aur woh iss haq kay sath jo tumharay pass aa chuka hai kufur kertay hain payghumbar ko aur khud tumhen bhi mehaz iss waja say jila watan kertay hain kay tum apney rab per eman rakhtay ho agar tum meri raah mein jihad kay liye aur meri raza mandi ki talab mein nikaltay ho ( to inn say dostiyan na kero) tum inn kay pass mohabbat ka paygham posheeda posheeda bhejtay ho aur mujhay khoob maloom hai jo tum ney chupaya aur woh bhi jo tum ney zahir kiya tum mein say jo bhi iss kaam ko keray ga woh yaqeenan raah-e-raast say behak jaye ga
